pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ROVAWrapper to get ROVA calendar from Rova's APIAcces to ROVA API has been simplified since version 0.2.1 of this wrapperJust use https://www.rova.nl/api/waste-calendar/upcoming?postalcode=1000AA&houseNumber=1&addition=&take=5with a existing combination of postalcode, housenumber, [housenumber addition]take=5 means that five upcoming dates are returned, min is 1 max unknownBe aware that ROVA API has not been officially published by ROVA.## Create a new connection by supplying your zip code and house number```r = rova.Rova(YOUR_ZIP_CODE, YOUR_HOUSE_NUMBER, [YOUR_HOUSE_NUMBER_ADDITION])```## API RequestCheck wether ROVA collects garbage at the given zip code and house number and addition```def is_rova_area():```This method return the parsed JSON response as a list.```def get_calendar_items([TAKE]):```
